title: Natural stimulants and Ayurveda

cleaned_text: Natural stimulants and Ayurveda Plant extracts with stimulating and energizing effects. The most popular natural stimulants include caffeine, guarana, and ginseng, for example. Ayurveda is the oldest natural method originating in India, which uses the power of plants. Its goal is to maintain a balance between body and mind.
